description: Register a pair of images using the elastix CLI.

optional.-masks: Set to 1 if you want to use masks.
optional.-fm: Specify fixed modality e.g. -fm SPECT-CT. Default is SPECT-CT
optional.-mm: Specify moving modality e.g. -mm ceMRI. Default is ceMRI
optional.-t: Specify the type you want to register ('volume' or 'liver' or 'liver_box'). Default is volumes
